data.title: WCHS (ABC 8) / WVAH (FOX 11)
data.meta_description: WCHS (ABC 8) / WVAH (FOX 11) and Compulse Integrated Marketing are a powerful team that provide state-of-the-art digital solutions. We believe digital marketing is about the destination, and our team is here to help you enjoy the ride. We use our expertise to propel your business forward to reach your target audience compellingly and effectively.
data.text:
Who We Are

ABC 8, FOX 11,

and Compulse are a powerful team that provide state-of-the-art digital solutions. We believe digital marketing is about the destination, and our team is here to help you enjoy the ride. We use our expertise to propel your business forward to reach your target audience compellingly and effectively. We work with clients, both big and small, to maximize their potential in the continually changing digital atmosphere. You have the drive; we have the reach.

Learn More

Our Services

Services for Every Business Solution

Trusting a full-service marketing agency like Compulse means believing in the services they offer. Our team has both the dedication and the know-how to help your company achieve its marketing goals. Our experts are trained and experienced in areas such as digital advertising, OTT, search optimization, social media services, creative services, email marketing, mobile, native advertising, web services, and white-label services.

Learn More

About Compulse

We understand that one size fits none. At Compulse, we combine powerful self-serve solutions with expert managed service so you can manage all of your own ad campaigns seamlessly using a single platform for every programmatic marketing tactic — complete with a unified reporting dashboard that makes data-driven campaigns easy. If you’d rather leave it all to us, you can also leverage our in-house teams for a fully managed service experience. Whether you want to work independently or need a team you can rely on to lead your day-to-day campaigns, we’ve got your back.
